TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void InvalidSignatureEventHandler(object sender, SignatureVerificationEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed InvalidSignatureEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.param: The invalid source of the event.
Docs.summary: Represents the method that handles the that is raised when <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignatureManager.VerifySignatures%2A> detects an invalid signature.
